section.name: Person Directory Library
section.p:
The person directory library allows retrieval of registry attributes relating to users in uPortal.
LDAP
XML File
Databases through JDBC
The person directory library interfaces IPersonAttributeDAO with these various sources, combinations of them, and specific adapters of the same nature.

section.name: Person Directory Dependencies
section.p:
Circa Java 1.4 there is no binding through the JNDI interface to LDAP as a registry so we can use the booster pack from SUN to integrate LDAP and JNDI.
ldapbp.jar
found in the ./lib directory from the CVS module PersonDirectory.
